message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item comes with a wide range of features and benefits that we believe will greatly enhance your experience. Considering its quality and capabilities, I propose a price of $15000 for this product. I look forward to your response.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality and features of your product. However, my budget allows me to spend up to $12000 for this purchase. Would it be possible for you to consider a price closer to this amount?
